original_text: In the day when the keepers of the house shall tremble, and the strong men shall bow themselves, and the grinders cease because they are few, and those that look out of the windows be darkened,
korean_text: 그런 날에는 집을 지키는 자들이 떨 것이며 힘 있는 자들이 구부러질 것이며 맷돌질 하는 자들이 적으므로 그칠 것이며 창들로 내다 보는 자가 어두워질 것이며

sentences.original_text: In the day when the keepers of the house shall tremble
and the strong men shall bow themselves
and the grinders cease because they are few
and those that look out of the windows be darkened
